thread.title: Virginia
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Virginia

author: Virginia
title: Virginia
text: We were greeted as soon as we entered. Asked if we needed help. Said we were just looking. No one hovered over us, but they were ready when we decided. Holly was very helpful, informative, asked and answered questions. She explained everything very clearly. Was very sweet and considerate.
